targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(ResourceCapacityUsed) as RCU, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", g, avg(RCU) AS ARCU
  FROM roles_summed
  WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime)
  GROUP BY 1, 2, Site
)
SELECT time, sum(ARCU), g AS metric
FROM indiv_avg
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Average Capacity Used by Group and Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(FileCount) as FC, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", g, avg(FC) AS AFC
  FROM roles_summed
  WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime)
  GROUP BY 1, 2, Site
)
SELECT time, sum(AFC), g AS metric
FROM indiv_avg
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Average File Count by Group and Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(ResourceCapacityUsed) as RCU, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", Site, avg(RCU) AS ARCU
  FROM roles_summed
  WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime)
  GROUP BY 1, 2, g
)
SELECT time, sum(ARCU), Site AS metric
FROM indiv_avg
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Average Capacity Used by Site and Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(FileCount) as FC, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", Site, avg(FC) AS AFC
  FROM roles_summed
  WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime)
  GROUP BY Site, g, time
)
SELECT time, sum(AFC), Site AS metric
FROM indiv_avg
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY time

targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(ResourceCapacityUsed) as RCU, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime

  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", avg(RCU) as ARCU, Site
  FROM roles_summed
  GROUP BY time, Site, g

SELECT time, sum(ARCU), Site
FROM indiv_avg
GROUP BY time, Site

targets.rawSql:
WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(ResourceCapacityUsed) as RCU, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", avg(RCU) as ARCU, g

panels.title: Average Capacity Used by Group (Current Month)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as "time",
  avg(ResourceCapacityUsed) as "Disk"
FROM VStarRecords
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(EndTime) and StorageMedia="disk" and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
GROUP BY 
  Site, `Group`

SELECT
  now() as "time",
  avg(ResourceCapacityUsed) as "Tape"
FROM VStarRecords
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(EndTime) and StorageMedia="tape" and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
GROUP BY 
  Site, `Group`

SELECT
  now() as "time",
  avg(ResourceCapacityUsed) as "Unspecified"
FROM VStarRecords
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(EndTime) and StorageMedia="None" and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
GROUP BY 
  Site, `Group`

WITH indiv_avg AS(
  WITH roles_summed AS(
    SELECT EndTime, sum(FileCount) as FC, `Group` as g, Site
    FROM VStarRecords
    WHERE $__timeFilter(EndTime) and Site in ($All_Sites) and `Group` in ($All_Groups)
    GROUP BY Site, g, EndTime
  )
  SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year(EndTime), "-", Month(EndTime), "-01 00:00:00"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS "time", avg(FC) as AFC, Site
  FROM roles_summed
  GROUP BY time, Site, g
)
SELECT time, sum(AFC), Site
FROM indiv_avg
GROUP BY time, Site
ORDER BY time
